name: Wild Wolf Quest Online: PVP Survival Simulator
name_original: Wild Wolf Quest Online: PVP Survival Simulator
description:
Ever dreamed about your own clan of wolves? These portly and powerful creatures are so exciting that almost everyone would like to have them! Live the full cycle of wolf's life - from little wolf puppy to the giant mighty pack leader! Choose your own wolf, roam about the forest and plain with Wild Wolf Quest Online: PVP Survival Simulator!
Become a gorgeous predator beast with a lot of abilities and skills! Fight with every cruel monster, predator and herbivorous animal, battle with other players or make friends with them – this choice is up to you! Hunt various animals to feed yourself and your little pack of wolves, conquer the first place in this packs race and kill your rivals without mercy!
Chase your prey up to the end! Your every sharp claw and fang can bring a deadly result on your rivals! Be the explorer of these wild places, defeat all your enemies and become a real king of this forest! Start your own adventure, finish every fighting or exploring mission and don’t forget that there are a lot of horrible creatures willing to kill everything alive!
Watch out your energy, health and hunger stats, otherwise you can suddenly find yourself weak and dying during the important fight with your wolf opponent! Protect your pack from cruel attacks of your rivals and unleash your inner fury in Wild Wolf Quest Online: PVP Survival Simulator!
Earn points for successfully done contests, level up and upgrade your brutal wolf to be truly almighty! Choose your wolf and make its story really unique! This is the next level to animal simulators’ lovers! Become the ruler of the world with Wild Wolf Quest Online: PVP Survival Simulator!
Wild Wolf Quest Online: PVP Survival Simulator features:
• Ultimate wolf survival simulator
• Various missions with different enemies
• Several colorful wolves to play for
• Opportunity to live a life of a real wolf pack
Clash against players all over the world! Set up a howl, breathe deeply and enjoy the life of powerful wolves with Wild Wolf Quest Online: PVP Survival Simulator!
